rio tinto  - sees 2020 production of mined copper at 475 to 520 kt

rio tinto - capital expenditure originally planned for 2020 may subsequently flow into 2021 and 2022
rio tinto  - capital expenditure is now expected to be 5 to 6 bln in 2020

rio tinto  - qtrly pilbara iron ore production 100 basis 77.8 mt vs 76 mt a year ago
rio tinto  - qtrly pilbara iron ore shipments 100 basis 72.9 mt vs 69.1 mt as reported last yr
